p: Ecological theory provides an opportunity to develop restoration strategies based on how species assemble and regulate invasions (Funk, Cleland, Suding, & Zavaleta, 2008; Laughlin, 2014; Shea & Chesson, 2002; Zedler, 2005). A variety of theories and mechanisms are proposed, but two mechanisms are particularly relevant: competition‚Äêbased biotic resistance and diversity effect.
